text:
[Good Vibes Club](https://x.com/GoodVibesssClub) is dropping on Fuse.

A project that has already set a new creative standard is now finding a new home here. This is a cultural crossing.

The whitelist raffle is officially open. Here’s how it works:

1️⃣ Join the raffle, start earning tickets, and you’re in the running.

2️⃣ Complete tasks to earn tickets → Every task = more raffle tickets. The more you do, the higher your chances.

3️⃣ Winners get access to mint during the whitelist phase. Be quick, if you don’t mint your pack, your spot may expire.

GVC is a lifestyle, a community, a vibe that grows with the people who hold it.

Claim your place: [LINK](https://t.me/fuse/store?startapp=collection_856274b4-230b-4469-848c-bc18be78db25)
